//
// https://www.youtube.com/@LeventeDaradici/videos
//

#include "U8glib.h"
U8GLIB_SH1106_128X64 u8g(U8G_I2C_OPT_NONE);

void draw(void) {
  //u8g.setFont(u8g_font_profont29r);
  u8g.setFont(u8g_font_gdr25);
  //u8g.drawStr(5, 40, "(ABg)");
  u8g.setPrintPos(12, 29);
  u8g.print("Ez 1.3\"");
  u8g.setPrintPos(18, 44);
  u8g.setFont(u8g_font_profont12);
  u8g.print("feher i2c OLED");
  u8g.setPrintPos(20, 64);
  u8g.setFont(u8g_font_profont22);
  u8g.print("ARDUINO");
}

void draw2(void) {
  u8g.setFont(u8g_font_profont12);
  u8g.setPrintPos(17, 10);
  u8g.print("Arduino i2c OLED");
  u8g.setFont(u8g_font_profont22);
  u8g.setPrintPos(16, 37);
  u8g.print("kepernyo");
  u8g.setPrintPos(17, 64);
  u8g.setFont(u8g_font_profont12);  
  u8g.print("LEVENTE DARADICI");
}

/**
 * Made with Marlin Bitmap Converter
 * https://marlinfw.org/tools/u8glib/converter.html
 *
 * This bitmap from the file 'arduino-logo-1.png'
 */

#define EOZMQ_BMPWIDTH  64
#define EOZMQ_BMPHEIGHT 64

  B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000111,B11100000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,

/**
 * Made with Marlin Bitmap Converter
 * https://marlinfw.org/tools/u8glib/converter.html

 * This bitmap from the file 'Arduino_LOGO.png'

#define K9VGJU_BMPHEIGHT 64

  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11100000,B00011111,B11110000,B00001111,B11100000,B00011111,B11110000,B00001111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,
  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11100000,B00000111,B11000000,B00001111,B11100000,B00000111,B11000000,B00001111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,
  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11110000,B00000000,B00000000,B00011111,B11110000,B00000000,B00000000,B00011111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,

  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111000,B00111100,B00000011,B00000000,B01100011,B11000110,B00000001,B11000011,B10011000,B00000111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,
  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11110000,B00111100,B00000011,B00000000,B00100011,B11000110,B00000001,B11000011,B10011000,B00000011,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,
  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11110000,B00111100,B01100011,B00011110,B00100011,B11000111,B11000111,B11000001,B10010001,B11100001,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,

  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11000000,B00001100,B01000011,B00011110,B00100011,B11000111,B11000111,B11001100,B00010001,B11100001,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,
  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11000000,B00001100,B01100011,B00011100,B00100001,B11000111,B11000111,B11001110,B00010000,B11100011,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,
  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11000111,B10000100,B01100001,B00000000,B01110000,B00000110,B00000001,B11001110,B00011000,B00000011,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,
  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B10001111,B11000100,B01110001,B00000000,B11110000,B00001110,B00000001,B11001111,B00011100,B00000111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,
  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B01111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B10111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,
  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,
  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,
  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,
  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,
  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,
  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,
  B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111,B11111111
};


void draw3(void) {
  u8g.drawBitmapP( 32, 0, 8, 64,  bitmap_eozmq);
}

void draw4(void) {
  u8g.drawBitmapP( 0, 0, 16, 128,  bitmap_k9vgju);
}

void draw5(void) {
  u8g.drawBitmapP( 0, 0, 16, 128,  bitmap_k9vgju2);
}

void setup(void) {
}

void loop(void) 
  {
     u8g.firstPage();
       do {
            draw();
          } while (u8g.nextPage() );
     delay(3500);
     u8g.firstPage();
       do {
            draw2();
          } while (u8g.nextPage());
     delay(3500);
     u8g.firstPage();
       do {
            draw3();
          } while( u8g.nextPage() );
     delay(3500);
     u8g.firstPage();
       do {
            draw4();
          } while( u8g.nextPage() );
     delay(3500);    
     u8g.firstPage();
       do {
            draw5();
          } while( u8g.nextPage() );
     delay(3500);      
}
